Offline.title: You're Offline
Offline.description: It looks like you're not connected to the internet. Don't worry, Talis works offline! You can still use all the dice rollers you've already visited.
Offline.helpText: To access new pages or features, please check your internet connection and try again.

About.rollerBrokenDescription: If a roller is not working correctly, you can clear the cache to try and fix it. This will reset all settings for all rollers, but your theme and mode preferences will be preserved.
About.clearCacheDialogDescription: This will clear all settings for all rollers. Your theme and mode preferences will be preserved. This action cannot be undone.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.vibrationSettingsDescription: Configure haptic feedback for dice rolling and selection
Settings.enableAllVibrationDescription: Enable or disable all vibration feedback options at once
Settings.diceRollVibrationDescription: Enable vibration feedback when rolling dice
Settings.selectWheelVibrationDescription: Enable vibration feedback when selecting dice amounts on the wheel
Settings.vibrationPlatformNote: Note: Vibration feedback only works on Android devices. iOS does not support the Vibration API.
